snippet: Space-exploration auctions, including memorabilia of female astronauts, will be held by Bonhams in New York, Heritage Auctions in Dallas and Regency-Superior in St. Louis.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Russian space suit worn by American astronaut Shannon Lucid will be auctioned by Bonhams in New York; Ruth Ann Bramson, great-granddaughter of the artist Charles Henry Miller, and Geoffrey K Fleming, director of the Southold Historical Society, have collaborated on the book Charles Henry Millerm N.A.: Painter of Long Island.
lead_paragraph: Space-exploration auctions, including memorabilia of female astronauts, will be held by Bonhams in New York, Heritage Auctions in Dallas and Regency-Superior in St. Louis.

headline.seo: Female Astronauts’ Memorabilia for Sale at Auctions
